messages.content:
The image shows grape clusters that appear to be affected by a potential disease or pest issue. The symptoms include abnormal growth and discoloration, which could indicate problems such as powdery mildew or pest infestations.

Here are some recommended preventive measures:

1. **Improving Air Circulation**: Ensure that the grapevines are well-spaced to allow for airflow.
2. **Regular Inspection**: Check for pests or fungal growth regularly.
3. **Sanitation**: Remove any affected leaves or clusters to prevent the spread of disease.

For targeted treatment, consult with a local agricultural extension service or a pest management professional who can provide specific recommendations based on the observed symptoms. If possible, please provide a clearer image focusing on the affected areas for a more accurate analysis.

messages.content:
તમે અપલોડ કરેલ છબીમાં આરોગ્યવંતી બટાકાની છોડો દર્શાવવામાં આવી છે, જેમાં ટ્યુબરોનું સારું ઉત્પાદન છે. બટાકા યોગ્ય કદ અને આકારમાં છે, જે યોગ્ય વૃદ્ધિની શરતો દર્શાવે છે. પાન લીલા અને મજબૂત દેખાય છે, જે પાકની કુલ આરોગ્ય માટે સકારાત્મક સંકેત છે.

પરંતુ, છબીમાં કોઈ રોગ અથવા કીટક નુકસાનના સ્પષ્ટ ચિહ્નો વિના, કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ વિશ્લેષણ આપવું મુશ્કેલ છે. જો તમને કીટકો અથવા રોગો વિશે ચિંતાઓ છે, તો કૃપા કરીને પાન અથવા કોઈ અસરગ્રસ્ત વિસ્તારો પર ધ્યાન કેન્દ્રિત કરીને વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી પ્રદાન કરો.

ઓપ્ટિમલ વૃદ્ધિ માટે, ખાતરી કરો કે છોડોને પૂરતું પાણી અને પોષણ મળી રહ્યું છે. પાકની આરોગ્ય જાળવવા માટે કીટકો અને રોગો માટે નિયમિત મોનિટરિંગ પણ ભલામણ કરવામાં આવે છે.

For optimal growth, make sure the plants are getting enough water and nutrition. Regular monitoring for pests and diseases is also recommended to maintain the health of the crop.

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content:
"Patsala" પ્લોટમાં હાલ "Tuber development" તબક્કામાં છે, જે 2025-01-20 થી શરૂ થયો છે. 

હવે, આ અઠવાડિયે (અઠવાડિયું 1) ખાતર આપવાની સૂચનાઓ છે:

1. **પ્રથમ દિવસ (2025-01-26)**:
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: 3.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - નોંધ: Calcium nitrate ને અન્ય ખાતરોની લાગણી પછી 15-20 મિનિટ પછી અલગથી લાગુ કરવું.

2. **ચોથા દિવસ (2025-01-29)**:
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ ખાતરોને ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા લાગુ કરવું. 

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને ખાતર આપો અને તમારા પાકની વૃદ્ધિ માટે શ્રેષ્ઠ પરિણામો મેળવો!
messages.en:
The "Patsala" plot is currently in the "Tuber Development" stage, starting from 2025-01-20. 

Now, this week (Week 1) there are instructions to give fertilizer:

1. **Day 1 (2025-01-26)**:
   **Calcium Nitrate**: 3.5 kg/acre
   **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre
   Note: Apply calcium nitrate separately 15-20 minutes after the feeling of other fertilizers.

2. **Day 4 (2025-01-29)**:
   * **Magnesium Sulphate**: 5 kg/acre
   **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre

Applying these fertilizers through fertigation method. 

Fertilize using this information and get the best results for the growth of your crop!

faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

The present soil moisture in the "khijrawala" plot is 6 kPa and 21 kPa, indicating humid conditions. 

The right moisture for your crop ranges from 5 kPa (humidity) to 35 kPa (dry). At 21 kPa, the ground is still moist, so there is currently no need to water.

faq:
Q: What diseases prediction does fyllo support?
A: Fyllo supports the following diseases:
    Alternaria, Alternaria Fruit Blotch, Alternaria blotch, Alternaria leaf blight,
    Anthracnose, Bacterial Blight, Bacterial Canker, Bacterial Spot, Blister blight, Botrytis mold, Brown Rust,
    Brown spot, Cercospora, Cercospora Leaf Spot, Cercospora leaf spot, Cigar end rot, Citrus scab, Colletotrichum, Damping off,
    Diplodia, Downy mildew, Early Blight, Fruit Canker, Fruit canker, Fusarium Wilt, Fusarium wilt, Graphiola leaf spot,
    Grey mold, Late Blight, Leaf Blight, Leaf Spot, Leaf spot, Marssonina blotch, Powdery Mildew, Powdery mildew,
    Purple blotch, Red rot, Rice blast, Root knot nematode, Rust, Scab, Sheath blight, Sigatoka leaf spot, Stylar End Rot,
    Whip smut, Xanthomonas, and Yellow Rust.

messages.content:
"ખીજડાવાળા" પ્લોટમાં બટાકાના પાકમાં કોઈ વિશિષ્ટ રોગની ઓળખ કરવામાં આવી નથી. પરંતુ, અહીં કેટલીક સામાન્ય ભલામણો છે:

1. **પેસ્ટની તપાસ**: નિયમિત રીતે પેસ્ટના ચિહ્નો માટે તપાસો અને અસરગ્રસ્ત ટ્યુબર્સને દૂર કરો.
2. **સાંસ્કૃતિક પદ્ધતિઓ**: પેસ્ટની વસ્તી ઘટાડવા માટે યોગ્ય પાક ફેરફાર અને જમીન વ્યવસ્થાપન સુનિશ્ચિત કરો.
3. **જૈવિક વિકલ્પો**: પેસ્ટ સામે રક્ષણાત્મક પગલાં તરીકે નીમ તેલ અથવા ઇન્સેક્ટિસાઇડ સોપનો ઉપયોગ કરવા પર વિચાર કરો.

જો વધુ સ્પષ્ટ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો કૃપા કરીને અસરગ્રસ્ત બટાકાના વધુ સ્પષ્ટ છબી આપો.
messages.en:
No specific disease has been identified in the potato crop in the "khijrawala" plot. But, here are some general recommendations:

1. **Check the paste**: Check regularly for signs of the paste and remove the affected tubers.
2. **Cultural methods**: Ensure proper crop change and land management to reduce the population of pest.
3. **Biological options**: Consider using neem oil or insecticide soap as a protective measure against paste.

If you want more clear information, please give a more clear image of the affected potato.

messages.content:
"Patsala" પ્લોટમાં હાલની જમીનની ભેજ 0 kPa અને 4 kPa છે, જે ખૂબ જ ભેજવાળી સ્થિતિ દર્શાવે છે. આથી, પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી. 

જો ભેજ 20 kPa અથવા તેથી વધુ થાય, ત્યારે પાણી આપવું જોઈએ. હાલ, જમીન ભેજમાં કોઈ વધારાની જરૂર નથી.
messages.en:
The current soil moisture in the "Patsala" plot is 0 kPa and 4 kPa, indicating very humid conditions. Therefore, there is no need to give water. 

If the humidity is 20 kPa or more, water should be given. At present, there is no need for any increase in soil moisture.

faq:
Q: What are mixed fertilizers (NPK)?
A: NPK fertilizers are represented by a three-number sequence, such as 10-10-10, indicating the percentage by weight of each nutrient. For example, 10-10-10 means the fertilizer contains 10% Nitrogen, 10% Phosphorus, and 10% Potassium elements in the chemical mixture. Some examples are below:
0-40-37, 0-40-40, 0-49-32, 0-52-34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0-55-18, 0-60-20, 0-9-46, 10-26-26, 10-54-10, 11-44-11, 12-11-18, 12-32-16, 12-61-0, 13-0-45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13-40-13, 19-19-19, 20-20-0-13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24-24-0, 30-10-10, 6-34-17
Or 0:40:37, 0:40:40, 0:49:32, 0:52:34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0:55:18, 0:60:20, 0:9:46, 10:26:26, 10:54:10, 11:44:11, 12:11:18, 12:32:16, 12:61:0, 13:0:45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13:40:13, 19:19:19, 20:20:0:13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24:24:0, 30:10:10, 6:34:17
Or 0.40.37, 0.40.40, 0.49.32, 0.52.34 (Mono potassium phosphate), 0.55.18, 0.60.20, 0.9.46, 10.26.26, 10.54.10, 11.44.11, 12.11.18, 12.32.16, 12.61.0, 13.0.45 (Potassium Nitrate), 13.40.13, 19.19.19, 20.20.0.13 (Ammonium Phosphate Sulphate), 24.24.0, 30.10.10, 6.34.17

messages.content:
"Patsala" પ્લોટમાં હાલ "Tuber development" તબક્કામાં છે, જે 2025-01-20 થી શરૂ થયો છે. 

હવે, આ અઠવાડિયે (અઠવાડિયું 1) ખાતર આપવાની સૂચનાઓ છે:

1. **પ્રથમ દિવસ (2025-01-26)**:
   - **Calcium Nitrate**: 3.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - નોંધ: Calcium nitrate ને અન્ય ખાતરોની લાગણી પછી 15-20 મિનિટ પછી અલગથી લાગુ કરવું.

2. **ચોથા દિવસ (2025-01-29)**:
   - **Magnesium Sulphate**: 5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર
   - **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 કિલોગ્રામ/એકર

આ ખાતરોને ફર્ટિગેશન પદ્ધતિ દ્વારા લાગુ કરવું. 

આ માહિતીનો ઉપયોગ કરીને ખાતર આપો અને તમારા પાકની વૃદ્ધિ માટે શ્રેષ્ઠ પરિણામો મેળવો!
messages.en:
The "Patsala" plot is currently in the "Tuber Development" stage, starting from 2025-01-20. 

Now, this week (Week 1) there are instructions to give fertilizer:

1. **Day 1 (2025-01-26)**:
   **Calcium Nitrate**: 3.5 kg/acre
   **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre
   Note: Apply calcium nitrate separately 15-20 minutes after the feeling of other fertilizers.

2. **Day 4 (2025-01-29)**:
   * **Magnesium Sulphate**: 5 kg/acre
   **Sulfate of Potash**: 6.5 kg/acre

Applying these fertilizers through fertigation method. 

Fertilize using this information and get the best results for the growth of your crop!

faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

messages.content:
"ખીજડાવાળા" પ્લોટમાં હાલની જમીનની ભેજ 6 kPa અને 21 kPa છે, જે ભેજવાળી સ્થિતિ દર્શાવે છે. 

તમારા પાક માટે યોગ્ય ભેજ 5 kPa (ભેજ) થી 35 kPa (શુષ્ક) છે. 21 kPa પર, જમીન હજુ પણ ભેજવાળી છે, તેથી હાલમાં પાણી આપવાની જરૂર નથી. 

જો ભેજ 35 kPa અથવા તેથી વધુ થાય, ત્યારે પાણી આપવું જોઈએ.
messages.en:
The present soil moisture in the "khijrawala" plot is 6 kPa and 21 kPa, indicating humid conditions. 

The right moisture for your crop ranges from 5 kPa (humidity) to 35 kPa (dry). At 21 kPa, the ground is still moist, so there is currently no need to water. 

If the humidity is 35 kPa or more, water should be given.

આ તબક્કામાં, પાકને યોગ્ય રીતે કાપવા માટે તૈયાર છે. ખાતરી કરો કે પાકને યોગ્ય રીતે કાપવા માટે તમામ જરૂરી પગલાં લેવામાં આવ્યા છે.
messages.en:
The current maturity of the potato crop in the "khejrawala" plot is in the "Maturity and Harvest" stage, starting from 2025-01-05. 

At this stage, the crop is ready to be harvested properly. Ensure that all necessary steps are taken to harvest the crop properly.

messages.content:
The analysis of the uploaded image shows grape clusters with some discoloration, particularly a pinkish hue on some fruits. This may indicate a potential issue, such as a pest or disease affecting the grapes.

### Recommendations:
1. **Inspect for Pests**: Check for any signs of pests like fruit flies or small insects.
2. **Check for Fungal Diseases**: Look for unusual spots or mold on the leaves or fruit.
3. **Maintain Good Airflow**: Ensure the vines are well-spaced to promote airflow, which can help prevent disease.

If the issue persists or worsens, consider consulting a local agricultural expert for targeted advice and treatment options.

### Recommendations:
1. **Inspect for Pests**: Check for any signs of pests like fruit flies or small insects.
2. **Check for Fungal Diseases**: Look for unusual spots or mold on the leaves or fruit.
3. **Maintain Good Airflow**: Ensure the vines are well-spaced to promote airflow, which can help prevent disease.

If the issue persists or worsens, consider consulting a local agricultural expert for targeted advice and treatment options.

messages.standalone_en: My device has not been working for two days. What should I do?

messages.content:
If your Kairo device has not been working for two days, please check the following:

1. **Recharge Status**: Ensure that your data plan is active and has not expired.
2. **Device Connection**: Verify that the device is properly connected and not loose.
3. **Network Connectivity**: Check if there is a stable internet connection.
4. **Battery Status**: Ensure the device has sufficient battery power.

If everything seems fine and the device is still not working, please raise a support ticket in the Fyllo app for further assistance.

messages.content: Karnata state farmer pls guide
messages.en: Karnata state farmer pls guide
messages.standalone_question: Can you provide guidance for farmers in Karnataka?
messages.standalone_en: Can you provide guidance for farmers in Karnataka?

messages.content:
As a farmer in Karnataka, here are some general guidelines for managing your grape crop:

1. **Soil Health**: Ensure your black soil is well-aerated and has good drainage. Regularly test the soil for nutrient levels and pH.

2. **Irrigation**: Monitor soil moisture levels. Grapes require consistent moisture, especially during the berry development stage. Use drip irrigation for efficient water use.

3. **Fertigation**: Apply fertilizers through the irrigation system during the active growth stages. Ensure you follow the recommended schedule for your grape variety.

4. **Pest Control**: Regularly check for pests like mealybugs and aphids. Use integrated pest management (IPM) practices, including biological controls and targeted pesticide applications.

5. **Disease Management**: Watch for diseases such as powdery mildew and downy mildew. Use fungicides as preventive measures during wet conditions.

6. **Pruning**: Proper pruning is essential for grapevines. Ensure you prune at the right time to promote healthy growth and fruit production.

7. **Weather Monitoring**: Keep an eye on local weather forecasts to anticipate any adverse conditions that may affect your crop.

If you have specific questions or need assistance with a particular aspect of your grape farming, feel free to ask!
messages.en:

faq:
Q: How do I start the Kairo device?
A: Press the switch below the top cap to start the device and wait until the parameters on the home screen are visible.

Q: How do I install the Fyllo app for Kairo?
A: Scan the QR code provided in the manual, click on the install button, and follow the instructions to download the app.

Q: How do I connect the Kairo device to the Fyllo app?
A: After installing the Fyllo app and entering the required details, connect the device by scanning the code sticker on the device.

Q: How do I insert batteries into the Kairo device?
A: Insert 2xAA batteries into the battery compartment, and ensure the LED indicator turns on and flashes every 16 seconds.

messages.standalone_question: What are the signs of sunburn on guava plants, and how can I address this issue?
messages.standalone_en: What are the signs of sunburn on guava plants, and how can I address this issue?

messages.content:
The analysis of the uploaded image indicates signs of sunburn on the guava plants. Here are some recommendations to manage this issue:

1. **Shade Protection**: Provide shade during the hottest parts of the day, especially for young plants. Use shade cloth or plant taller crops nearby to reduce direct sunlight exposure.

2. **Watering**: Ensure adequate watering to help the plants cope with heat stress. Mulching can also help retain soil moisture.

3. **Fertilization**: Avoid excessive nitrogen fertilization, as it can lead to lush growth that is more susceptible to sunburn. Use balanced fertilizers.

4. **Regular Monitoring**: Keep an eye on the plants for any further signs of distress or pest activity.

If you have any specific symptoms or further details, please share them for more targeted advice.

messages.content: Berry crack jau naye mhnun kontya level changlya pahije
messages.en: Which levels should be better to prevent the berry from cracking
messages.standalone_question: What level should I focus on for Berry crack?
messages.standalone_en: What level should I focus on for Berry crack?

messages.content:
Berry crack साठी चांगल्या पातळीवर ठेवण्यासाठी, तुम्हाला खालील गोष्टींचा विचार करावा लागेल:

1. **आर्द्रता**: 60% ते 70% दरम्यान हवा आर्द्रता ठेवणे आवश्यक आहे.
2. **तापमान**: 20°C ते 25°C च्या दरम्यान तापमान असावे.
3. **पाण्याचे व्यवस्थापन**: पाण्याची योग्य मात्रा आणि वेळेवर पाणी देणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. 

या पातळ्या राखल्यास, तुम्हाला बेरी क्रॅक कमी करण्यास मदत होईल.
messages.en:
To keep Berry crack at a good level, you'll need to consider the following:

1. **Humidity**: It is necessary to keep air humidity between 60% and 70%.
2. **Temperature**: The temperature should be between 20°C and 25°C.
3. **Water management**: It is important to provide the right amount of water and timely watering. 

Maintaining these levels will help you reduce berry cracks.

messages.content: Nutrient level kontya changlya phije crack hou nye
messages.en: What good fidges shouldn't crack nutrient levels
messages.standalone_question: What nutrient levels are ideal to prevent berry cracking?
messages.standalone_en: What nutrient levels are ideal to prevent berry cracking?

messages.content:
Berry crack टाळण्यासाठी, खालील पोषण स्तर चांगले असावे:

1. **Nitrogen (N)**: 50-100 ppm
2. **Phosphorus (P)**: 20-30 ppm
3. **Potassium (K)**: 150-200 ppm
4. **Calcium (Ca)**: 1000-1500 ppm
5. **Magnesium (Mg)**: 50-100 ppm

या पोषण स्तरांचे पालन केल्यास, तुम्हाला बेरी क्रॅक कमी करण्यास मदत होईल.
messages.en:
To avoid Berry crack, the following nutrition levels should be good:

1. **Nitrogen (N)**: 50-100 ppm
2. **Phosphorus (P)**: 20-30 ppm
3. **Potassium (K)**: 150-200 ppm
4. **Calcium (Ca)**: 1000-1500 ppm
5. **Magnesium (Mg)**: 50-100 ppm

Following these nutritional levels will help you reduce berry cracks.

messages.content: स्पोडप्टरा म्हणजे कांय
messages.en: Spodoptera is some
messages.standalone_question: What does "स्पोडप्टरा" mean?
messages.standalone_en: What does "Spodaptera" mean?

messages.content: स्पोडप्टरा (Spodoptera) म्हणजे एक प्रकारचा कीटक आहे जो मुख्यतः पिकांच्या पानांवर आक्रमण करतो. हा कीटक विशेषतः भाजीपाला, कापूस, आणि इतर पिकांमध्ये आढळतो. स्पोडप्टरा लार्वा पानांचे खाणे सुरू करतात, ज्यामुळे पिकांचे नुकसान होते. यावर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी, योग्य कीटकनाशकांचा वापर करणे आवश्यक आहे, जसे की लॅम्ब्डा सायहलोथ्रिन किंवा इतर प्रभावी कीटकनाशक.
messages.en: Spodoptera is a type of insect that mainly attacks the leaves of crops. This insect is found especially in vegetables, cotton, and other crops. Spodoptera larvae begin to eat leaves, causing crop damage. To control this, it is necessary to use appropriate pesticides, such as lambda cyhalothrin or other effective pesticides.
